SummaryEnglish: Miyama Suzune wishes to be an idol like Amasawa Akari, an idol who got her start through the Selection Project reality show. Suzune had been stricken with illness since she was little, but she listened to Akari's music often in her hospital room. Akari's voice gave Suzune smiles and courage, which encouraged Suzune to want to inspire others in the same way. In her last summer of junior high, Suzune decides to enter the seventh Selection Project to make her dreams come true.

1.SummaryEnglish: The Block Finals for Selection Project, an idol competition show, are about to begin, and Suzune Miyama is ready to take the stage!

2.TitleEnglish: The Girls on a Journey to Tomorrow
2.SummaryEnglish: Suzune, still dismayed by the results in the finals of the selections, receives a surprise visit from Seira. Hoping to cheer her up, Seira takes her around town, but Suzune discovers she might not be ready to sing again yet.

3.TitleEnglish: If Singing Vanished From the World
3.SummaryEnglish: The hopeful idols, now accommodated in the dorm, split into three teams to face a direct confrontation in the first round. Suzune's partner however doesn't seem very interested in working with her...

4.SummaryEnglish: It's the dance team's turn to shine! But tensions rise when the passionate Hiromi takes charge, and the other members cannot keep up. They need to work together to perfect their routine and create a catchy name.

5.SummaryEnglish: The Band will be the last to play, but there is a problem: they are not ready. Uta wants to do it at once and Shiori wants to polish her bassline, what will gentle Mami Mako do?

6.SummaryEnglish: Round 2 starts with an announcement: it's a swimsuit round! Everyone is excited to go to the beach and get some screams, except Suzune, and no one but Rena seems to know why.

7.SummaryEnglish: With Suzune threatening to drop out, the other eight idol candidates team up to bring her back to the group. A conversation with Rena and a letter from a fan might be what inspires her to continue.

8.TitleEnglish: The True Tone of Her Heart
8.SummaryEnglish:
The final judging task is to show off the original songs by the seven selected people.
It was revealed that the two people who will drop out will be decided by voting among the members,
The nine people who have deepened their relationship are terribly upset.

9.SummaryEnglish:
The heart of the legendary idol, Amazawa Akari, is in Suzune's chest ...!
Rena's heart sways in the shocking facts.
Her interview progresses, and her intentions for the nine dropouts gradually solidify ...

10.SummaryEnglish:
The results of the selection vote of the final examination are complete, and the members who will finally drop out have been decided.
A program that welcomes the development of turmoil.
And the members who returned to their hometown also started a certain project.

11.TitleEnglish: One Little Step at a Time
11.SummaryEnglish:
Nine people who restarted as an idol group "9-tie".
I want to deliver our songs without anybody missing
I started a live performance on the street, but it didn't go as I expected ...

12.TitleEnglish: The Feelings We Want You to Know
12.SummaryEnglish:
If you win 2 million ales in the live broadcast that made your debut,
The dream of becoming an idol as "9-tie" comes true!
As each of them got excited, something happened to her body ...

13.SummaryEnglish:
A light that pushes Suzune's back. Sunny reveals the secret of the light to Rena. A companion who believes and waits for two people.
Will the final live with the idol debut succeed?
Whereabouts of the battle for dreams ...?
